import { useRef, useState } from 'react' import UpdateFighter from './UpdateFighter' export default function AthleteModal({ fighter, setShowAtheleteModal }) { const [openUpdateFighterForm, setUpdateNewFighterForm] = useState(false) return ( <>
{/*content*/}
{/*header*/}

{fighter.first_name} {fighter.last_name}

{/*body*/}

{fighter.gym_name} {fighter.division_name}

{fighter.division_name}
{fighter.status}
{fighter.insta}
{/*footer*/}
{openUpdateFighterForm ? ( ) : null}
) }
